extension.name: SpecStory AutoSave
extension.description: Automatically saves SpecStory chat exports when closing VS Code and provides configurable auto-save intervals with AI activity monitoring
extension.specstoryNotActive: SpecStoryAutoSave: SpecStory extension is not active or not installed
extension.noComposerHistory: SpecStoryAutoSave: No Copilot chats found for export in this workspace. Try opening a workspace where you used Copilot chat.
extension.commandError: SpecStoryAutoSave: Command was executed, but an error occurred - check console for details
extension.noHistoryDeactivate: SpecStoryAutoSave: No Copilot chats found for export in {0}ms
extension.unexpectedError: SpecStoryAutoSave: Unexpected error during deactivation in {0}ms:

ai.activityDetected: SpecStoryAutoSave: Copilot activity detected - showing control notification
ai.checkPrompt: ‚ö†Ô∏è CHECK: AI responded to your prompt. Please verify the result!
ai.checkCode: ‚ö†Ô∏è CHECK: Large code changes detected (likely from AI). Please verify the result!
ai.tipViewCode: üí° Tip: Check the code changes and make sure AI understood your request correctly.
ai.tipCodeStructure: üí° Tip: Check the changes and make sure they match your request. You might need to provide AI with more context or HTML structure.
ai.requestFulfilled: ‚úÖ Great! AI fulfilled your request on the first try.
ai.requestFulfilledCorrectly: ‚úÖ Great! AI correctly understood and fulfilled your request.
ai.userCodeReview: SpecStoryAutoSave: User will review the code
ai.userMarkedNotAI: SpecStoryAutoSave: User marked change as non-AI
ai.largeChangeDetected: SpecStoryAutoSave: Large code change detected - showing control notification
ai.promptCount: SpecStoryAutoSave: AI prompt count: {0}, notification frequency: {1}
ai.smartDebug: AI just debugged! Recent prompts: {0} | Check: Fixed root cause? No new bugs? Test edge cases?
ai.smartUI: AI worked on UI! Recent prompts: {0} | Check: Responsive design? Accessibility? Cross-browser compatibility?
ai.smartDatabase: AI modified database! Recent prompts: {0} | Check: Data integrity? Performance impact? Backup strategy?
ai.smartAPI: AI created API! Recent prompts: {0} | Check: Error handling? Security? API documentation?
ai.smartPerformance: AI optimized performance! Recent prompts: {0} | Check: Actual speedup? Memory leaks? Functionality regression?
ai.smartSecurity: AI worked on security! Recent prompts: {0} | Check: Proper encryption? Input validation? Security best practices?
ai.smartDefault: AI worked on "{0}"! Recent prompts: {1} | Check: Meets requirements? No breaking changes? Documentation updated?

logging.detailedError: SpecStoryAutoSave: Detailed error when executing command:
logging.closingFiles: SpecStoryAutoSave: Detected file closing - starting export
logging.closingExportCompleted: SpecStoryAutoSave: Export on file closing completed
